unnormalised: Hey Future Toppers! Feeling the financial pinch while dreaming of IIT Delhi? Well, good news! Scholarship portals are becoming the 'it' thing in EdTech, making it easier than ever for students like you to find funding.
normalised: Hey Future Toppers! Feeling the financial pinch while dreaming of I I T Delhi? Well, good news! Scholarship portals are becoming the 'it' thing in EdTech, making it easier than ever for students like you to find funding.

unnormalised: Forget endless trips to cyber cafes! These platforms are like matrimonial sites, but instead of finding your soulmate, you're matching with scholarships. From engineering to arts, there's something for everyone.
normalised: Forget endless trips to cyber cafes! These platforms are like matrimonial sites, but instead of finding your soulmate, you're matching with scholarships. From engineering to arts, there's something for everyone.

unnormalised: Think of it: Rs. 50,000 here, a laptop scheme there... it all adds up! Dr. Sharma from Mumbai University says, "These portals are leveling the playing field, especially for students from Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities."
normalised: Think of it: rupees fifty thousand here, a laptop scheme there... it all adds up! Doctor Sharma from Mumbai University says, "These portals are leveling the playing field, especially for students from Tier two and Tier three cities."

unnormalised: Plus, many now offer personalized recommendations. Just fill in your details, and *boom*, scholarships tailored to your academic profile pop up. Some even offer assistance with the application process!
normalised: Plus, many now offer personalized recommendations. Just fill in your details, and boom, scholarships tailored to your academic profile pop up. Some even offer assistance with the application process!

unnormalised: Imagine the savings! That 1000 sq ft PG room near campus suddenly feels a lot more affordable, right? So, ditch the chai stall gossip and start exploring. Your academic aspirations are just a few clicks away! Happy scholarship hunting, folks! Don't forget to check eligibility criteria!
normalised: Imagine the savings! That one thousand square feet P G room near campus suddenly feels a lot more affordable, right? So, ditch the chai stall gossip and start exploring. Your academic aspirations are just a few clicks away! Happy scholarship hunting, folks! Don't forget to check eligibility criteria!
